sentence.Network_en: My husband has to take several pills to counteract high blood pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 我丈夫不得不吃几片药来降压。

sentence.Network_en: This event will counteract such trends.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一事件将会削弱此类趋势。

sentence.Network_en: These exercises aim to counteract the effects of stress and tension.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些训练旨在抵消压力与紧张的影响。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... transact 做交易；办理 counteract 抵抗；抵消 inactivity 不活跃.
...1a3 基因的额外副本）繁殖时，这个额外的正常基因抵消（counteracted）有问题的基因 -- 导致后代完全没有伊比力斯症。
MBA-2012年1月份MBA联考－英语答案详解 ... “counteracted” 表示“抵制，中和，对抗 ”， “ contradicted” 表示“反驳，与 ... 矛盾”。.
counter- 反对（和动词、抽象名词、形容词结合）：counteract(抵制)counterrevolution(反革命)counterproposal(反建议) counter.

list.abs: counteraction 颉抗作用counteraction need 反败需求counterattitudinal 逆态度的
逆注 Counterflow Pouring逆治 counteracting treatment逆者正治 counter-action is straight treatment
1t1t.com网络游戏《无尽的任务EQ》专区 ... 燃烧大法 Combust 中和疾病 Counteract Disease 中和毒素 Counteract Poison.
counter-vailing duty 反贴补税counteracting force 反作用力counteraction 反作用

entry.def: To counteract something means to reduce its effect by doing something that produces an opposite effect.

example.ex: My husband has to take several pills to counteract high blood pressure...
example.tran: 我丈夫不得不吃几片药来降压。

example.ex: This event will counteract such trends.
example.tran: 这一事件将会削弱此类趋势。

means.word_mean: 2. oppose or check by a counteraction
3. oppose and mitigate the effects of by contrary actions;

sentences.sentence: "This will counteract the foolish actions of my colleagues"

means.word_mean: 4. destroy property or hinder normal operations;

sentences.sentence: "The Resistance sabotaged railroad operations during the war"

auth_sentence.content: Casually reveal information to counteract that, he explains.
auth_sentence.res_content: Casually reveal information to counteract that, he explains.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Casually reveal information to counteract that, he explains.

auth_sentence.content: Does red wine directly counteract the effects of beef?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does red wine directly counteract the effects of beef?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does red wine directly counteract the effects of beef?

auth_sentence.content: I have to use my design skills to counteract it!
auth_sentence.res_content: I have to use my design skills to counteract it!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have to use my design skills to counteract it!

Sentence.sentence: Those trying to address issues of racial inequality need to constantly remind people of the inequalities that still exist to counteract the Obama's effect, she says.

sentences.en: The drug counteracts the effects of the poison.
sentences.cn: 这种药可抵消毒物的作用。

jushi.english: Drinking a lot of water counteracts the dehydrating effects of sweating.
jushi.chinese: 喝大量水正好抵消出汗引起的脱水效应。
